author: Simon Difford
description: Resembling watery orange custard, this cocktail is surprisingly silky and suited to after-dinner.
name: Eye-opener
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE and strain all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
